title: Kamisama, Kisama wo Koroshitai.
original_name: 神様、キサマを殺したい。
sinopse: A high school girl who lost hope were about to commit suicide, but before she could jump from the edge of the building, she suddenly witnessed a murder below. The young murderer was throwing the corpse in a manhole and then appears behind her, smiling and offering her a deal...
